original_title: ‘Daddy’ Trump and Western Europe’s oath of allegiance — RT World News
article_summary: Tulsi Gabbard, now the Director of National Intelligence, claims that the Obama administration falsely accused Donald Trump of colluding with Russia to delegitimize his 2016 election win. She alleges that Obama ordered intelligence officials to create a new assessment claiming Russia favored Trump over Hillary Clinton, a claim she says was untrue.</s>
